body:
This would be cool and, would bring lots of players for the time being. Maybe leave as a recreational thing. Here's a video with a free download by SethBling.

https://youtu.be/w41J4x2ybAA

No plugins needed, just command blocks!

Feedback is appreciated!

replies.body:
lelnothx.
Many people can't handle the server by itself, adding command blocks will just add more pressure to the server creating more block lag (which we know there is a ton) and lag other people as well, since ye know... command blocks makes everything lag at one point or another xd
